definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.english: All these facilities help society reduce the generation gap between the elderly and the others.
sentences.chinese: 這可以協助縮小老人和其他人之間的代溝。

sentences.english: And how to scale if the texture needs to be scaled down using the minification function.
sentences.chinese: 類似，在貼圖過多時，使用壓縮函數進行縮小。

sentences.english: His colleagues said he was reduced to Fei Xiang, I think so.
sentences.chinese: 他的同事們都說他是縮小了的費翔，我也這樣認爲。

sentences.english: The boy plays up his strong points and minimizes his weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 這男孩誇大自己的長處，極力縮小自己的缺點。

sentences.english: Those tumors took longer to shrink but the senescent tumor cells were eventually cleared away.
sentences.chinese: 這些腫瘤縮小需較長時間但老化的細胞最終消失。

sentences.english: Some regions shrank as much as 25% by 80 years of age.
sentences.chinese: 其中一些80歲人的大腦甚至縮小多達25%。

sentences.english: Red lasers further cool and shrink the cloud of atoms.
sentences.chinese: 紅激光進一步冷卻並縮小原子雲區域。

sentences.english: This issue was addressed by tightening the scope of some synchronized method calls.
sentences.chinese: 這種問題是從縮小同步化訪問調用的範圍來處理的。

sentences.english: I left my job because my company downsized.
sentences.chinese: 我離職是因爲我公司縮小編制。

sentences.english: The sizes of the 28-day loans will shrink early next year.
sentences.chinese: 央行將在明年年初縮小28天貸款的規模。

sentences.english: For the best view, Please double chlik the pics .
sentences.chinese: 原圖太大，雙擊圖片，縮小觀看，效果最佳。

sentences.english: That will only serve to shrink your effective target market.
sentences.chinese: 因爲那樣做將縮小您的有效的目標市場。

sentences.english: Varying the shape of the slot miniaturizes the size of the antenna.
sentences.chinese: 改變槽孔的形狀，使標籤天線面積縮小。

sentences.english: For minification only, in addition to the above two choices, you can also choose from.
sentences.chinese: 縮小紋理，除了上面兩個選擇以外，還可以設置爲。

sentences.english: To narrow the molecular beam (water group), adjusting the molecular structure of volatility.
sentences.chinese: 縮小分子束水分子集團，調整分子結構波動。

definition: to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
to reverse/to turn around (an undesirable situation)/(mechanics) torsion
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]
to ease (tension)/to alleviate/to moderate/to allay/to make more mild
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to wither/to dry up (of a plant)/to atrophy (of muscle, social custom etc)
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
